item.title: Will the Stock Market Keep Going Up? What to Know as the S&P 500 Hits New Highs.
item.description: Hope for rate cuts has been replaced by stronger economic growth as fuel for stocks.
item.content:encoded: Hope for rate cuts has been replaced by stronger economic growth as fuel for stocks.

item.title: Samsara’s Earnings and Outlook Top Estimates
item.description: The software firm had a particularly strong quarter with larger customers, its CEO said.

item.title: Marvell Technology Gives a Weak Outlook. The Chip Stock Tanks.
item.description: The company’s shares fell 10.2% to $76.41 in post-market trading following earnings.

item.title: NYCB, Novo Nordisk, Ciena, Kroger, Tesla, Rivian, Victoria’s Secret, and More Stock Market Movers
item.description: New York Community Bancorp jumps after getting an equity injection of more than $1 billion, Novo Nordisk surges after presenting data on a new obesity drug, and Ciena tumbles as revenue guidance misses estimates.
item.content:encoded: New York Community Bancorp jumps after getting an equity injection of more than $1 billion, Novo Nordisk surges after presenting data on a new obesity drug, and Ciena tumbles as revenue guidance misses estimates.

item.title: DocuSign Shares Spike as Earnings Top Street Estimates
item.description: The electronic signature and document management company posted revenue for the quarter of $712.4 million, up 8% from a year ago.
item.content:encoded: The electronic signature and document management company posted revenue for the quarter of $712.4 million, up 8% from a year ago.

item.title: Rivian Unveils R2, R3 Models and the Stock Soars
item.description: The electric-vehicle maker unveiled its new R2 platform—along with a few surprises.
item.content:encoded: The electric-vehicle maker unveiled its new R2 platform—along with a few surprises.

item.title: Cathie Wood Is Worried About Nvidia Stock. She Isn’t the Only One.
item.description: Cathie Wood says competition may intensify for Nvidia. Mizuho analyst Jordan Klein is cautious about the persistent gains of chip stocks.
item.content:encoded: Cathie Wood says competition may intensify for Nvidia. Mizuho analyst Jordan Klein is cautious about the persistent gains of chip stocks.

item.title: Ciena Tumbles as Revenue Outlook Misses on Soft Demand
item.description: The company said service providers are taking longer than expected to work through inventory.
item.content:encoded: The company said service providers are taking longer than expected to work through inventory.

item.title: American Eagle Stock Is Surging. Earnings Beat and There’s a Growth Plan.
item.description: Apparel retailer American Eagle reported a strong fourth quarter, and sees annual revenue surging to as much as $6 billion in a few years under a new initiative.

item.title: FuelCell Energy’s Revenue Drops More Than Expected
item.description: FuelCell Energy posts a narrower-than-expected fiscal first-quarter loss.

item.title: Novo Nordisk Surges. It’s on Track to Overtake Tesla’s Market Cap.
item.description: The company said its new treatment for weight loss, called Amycretin, appeared even more effective than its popular Wegovy drug in trials.
item.content:encoded: The company said its new treatment for weight loss, called Amycretin, appeared even more effective than its popular Wegovy drug in trials.

item.title: Nvidia Stock Is Catching Up With Apple. Why It Has Room to Run.
item.description: Nvidia shares look poised to rise for a sixth consecutive day. The chip maker’s valuation is closing in on Apple’s.

item.title: Europe’s Farmers Are Mad. They Could Tip the EU Elections.
item.description: Farmer grievances could help far-right parties grab a quarter of the European Parliament in elections this June, according to current polling.
item.content:encoded: Farmer grievances could help far-right parties grab a quarter of the European Parliament in elections this June, according to current polling.

item.title: Micron Stock Is an AI Play, Says New Bull
item.description: Stifel analyst Brian Chin upgraded shares of memory-chip maker Micron to Buy from Hold. His new $120 price target implies more than 20% upside.
item.content:encoded: Stifel analyst Brian Chin upgraded shares of memory-chip maker Micron to Buy from Hold. His new $120 price target implies more than 20% upside.

item.title: Regional Bank Stocks Jump After NYCB Cash Injection
item.description: Regional bank stocks were climbing early Thursday after New York Community Bancorp secured a $1 billion investment to boost the embattled lender.
item.content:encoded: Regional bank stocks were climbing early Thursday after New York Community Bancorp secured a $1 billion investment to boost the embattled lender.

item.title: ECB Keeps Rates Steady. Like the Fed, a June Cut Is Possible.
item.description: European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said in January that interest-rate reductions might be considered in the summer.

item.title: Chevron’s $53 Billion Deal to Acquire Hess Under Renewed Pressure From Exxon

item.title: Gold Keeps Hitting Records and ‘Not Everything Adds Up.’ What’s Moving Prices.

item.title: Stocks Can Rise Despite Powell’s Reluctance to Cut Rates. Here’s Why.
item.description: Tesla is no longer one of the top 10 most valuable S&P 500 companies, New York Community Bancorp gets a $1 billion lifeline, and other news to start your day.
